site.name: duyen.mar
site.tagline: Driving Growth with SEO, Content & CRM Automation

hero.headline: Hi there, I'm Tran Duyen'
hero.subhead: Love crafting strategies that resonate, not just decorate

about.short: Customer-centric digital marketer blending SEO strategy, social content, and CRM automation to deliver both visibility and conversion gains.
key_highlights: 2.55M annual users via SEO and content growth
Google Maps Top 1–3 for 4 consecutive years (Local SEO)
Email OR up to 70.4% and CTR up to 18% on warm segments
Google Ads CTR +14.5% with 30% fewer erroneous leads
+12.7% traffic after UX and technical improvements

case_studies.title: SEO & Site Growth – MOS Training Center
case_studies.problem: Low discoverability and poor site performance limited growth.
actions: Enhanced page speed, image compression, hosting/domain governance
results: Sustained Google Maps Top 1–3 ranking for 4 years

case_studies.title: Website Optimization – iEIT
case_studies.problem: Outdated sitemap and heavy images hurt navigation and load times.
actions: Rewrote and reorganized web content for clarity
Updated sitemap and improved navigation labels
Optimized images and fixed technical blockers

case_studies.title: CRM & Email Automation – Lead Nurturing
case_studies.problem: Low-quality leads and weak engagement across funnels.
actions: Segmented cold vs. warm leads in Zoho/Getfly
Automated nurture/promo workflows tailored by segment
Aligned ad targeting and messaging with sales-qualified profiles

process: Discover — Research, analytics, voice of customer
Design — Map journeys, content, and hypotheses
Deliver — Execute campaigns, automation, A/B tests

tools: AI Tools (ChatGPT, Lovable, Grok, Surfer SEO, etc.)

samples.title: Social Media Campaigns
samples.context: Educational + meme content targeting office workers and students
samples.outcome: ~10% organic engagement rate, steady follower growth

samples.title: Landing Page Optimization – MOS Prep
samples.context: A/B tested landing page variants for MOS prep
samples.outcome: Higher lead capture and conversion rates

samples.title: Email Campaign Automation
samples.context: Segmented cold/warm leads; automated nurture flows in Zoho/Getfly
samples.outcome: Open rate up to 70.4%, CTR up to 18%, improved lead quality

footer.quote: Learn fast, adapt faster, never stop experimenting.
